author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-3961: Bean component now supports parameter values specified directly in method name option. You can now bind body, headers, fixed values etc. without any annotations or other means.

author: veithen
msg: Removed a redundant test case. The scenario is already covered by TestSerialize with detached=true.

author: coheigea
msg: Added ability to set the lifetime on an STSClient
